channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024040773
item.description:
Report X-2024040773

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the box in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: Once inspected found the box wet and with a strong-smelling odor. once inspected found that the inner container(glass) is cracked and broken into two pieces. All of the contents have leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into a plastic lined black tote.

item.title: Report X-2024040593
item.description:
Report X-2024040593

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-05
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the drum in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: once inspected found the removable drum top loose and a small dent and a small puncture. leading to leaking of the contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into a plastic spill bag lined red hazmat tote with lid.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the box in the Non hazmat storage area. DescribePack: once inspected found that the item is a regulated hazmat. it is shippen under a standard ground label, it is also not marked as a hazardous substance. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into a black plastic lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2024040604
item.description:
Report X-2024040604

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-05
  • City: OSHKOSH
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler had grabbed box off of tugger cart in the unload near door 4, and the bottom of the box failed. It was discovered at 4:16 am on 4/5/2024 and was reported right away by an unload manager. DescribePack: Medium size box had bottom fail which caused the pale to be dropped onto the floor. The bottom of the pale cracked causing the inner contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Cleaned up as soon as QA was notified of the hazmat damage.

item.title: Report X-2024040714
item.description:
Report X-2024040714

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER LEAKER IN THE SYSTEM. IT NEEDED TO BE REBOXED SO IT WAS OPENED. ONCE OPENED IT WAS DESCOVERED TO BE UNDECLARED LITHIUM ION BATTERIES CONTAINED IN EQUIPMENT (PACKAGE CONTAINS 30 VAPE PENS). THESE VAPE PENS EACH CONTAIN A RECHARGABLE BATTERY.

item.title: Report X-2024040337
item.description:
Report X-2024040337

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered in QA area in a bin with a plastic liner. DescribePack: One of the 5L bottles had a corroded inner seal, which caused the bottle to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bin with a plastic liner.

item.title: Report X-2024040318
item.description:
Report X-2024040318

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-15T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: MOSINEE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The unload team were unloading a trailer when the package was notice and QA was notified. cleaned and concealed for further inspections. DescribePack: The problem for this package was lack of packing skills with liquids. There was no cap on my container and the container was put inside of the box sideways. so almost all the liquid spilled thru the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: separate the package from others and put in a better container
